page.title: 10Events _Local tragedies
page.content: A tragic thing happened when two teams were playing rugby.Two men called Andrew Smith and Stephen Ditchburn were playing toy fights.When Stephen got up Andrew couldn't get up.He shouted to his girl friend and told her he'd broke his neck.At Hexham Hospital they x_rayed him and had broke his neck.now it seems he won't be able to walk again.MR Renney colapsed and died at his home in Flimby.He was about 60 years old.He was the District counciller and the schools chairman and was well liked by many people.A local counciller has put in a complaint about people going on the railway line.There has been a few of railway police going up and down the railway.About 20 people caught so far walking over the line and they will be find Â£25 each.
